attributes.action: Discuss the idea of a referendum for the independence of Yorkshire.
attributes.background: Yorkshire has a population of around 5.3 million. Scotland also has a population of around 5.3 million and had a referendum in 2014. It would only be fair to have Yorkshire referendum. With independance we can have a larger argricultural footprint on the map and bring more money to Britain.

rejection.details: You need to give your name to start a petition.
